page.title: 10MAYOR OF FAIRFORD
page.content: {Mrs Paton}has been the{mayor of {Fairford}since the beginning of June. Her role involves looking after council matters and dealing with local problems. Fairford has become a town because it was felt that Tetbury nearly the same size was getting priority because of its status as a town. {Milton Farm}where Mrs Paton lives, is mainly an arable one. She said that at one time she had enjoyed milking cows and rearing orphan lambs but with the increase in highly technical farm machinery she is now not so directly involved in the day to day workings of the farm. Mrs Paton is actively involved with the network of{W.I. markets}of which there are about twenty in the area. She is a {Governor of Farmor's school and the {Primary school.} She enjoys both gardening and bowls.
